items.sentence: Mary put her head on Tom\'s shoulder and Tom wrapped his arm around her.
There\'s still a chance that Tom might not have to spend time in prison.
Tom texted Mary to let her know that he was going to be late for dinner.
Looking at your phone as you\'re walking down stairs isn\'t a good idea.
Tom and I are good friends now, but we didn\'t like each other at first.
I can\'t tell you what a disappointment it was that Tom didn\'t show up.
It\'s hard to believe that something like that could happen around here.
Tom danced with Mary and only three other girls at the high school prom.
Tom didn\'t have the faintest idea what he was going to do the next day.
Tom was injured when a large chunk of ice slid off the roof and hit him.
